markdown: **Activate** <actions string="Three Actions" />focus;  **Frequency** once per hour;  **Requirements** You are within 10 feet of a  moonstone pool ; **Effect** You peer into the _moonstone pool_ and gain access to all the visual history recorded within the receptacle by concentrating on the specific subject you wish to see. Conversely, you can choose to deposit your own memories into the pool by concentrating for 1 hour on the information you wish to impart.
